thread.title: Jet Airways cuts fares by up to 30 per cent
thread.title_full: Jet Airways cuts fares by up to 30 per cent

author: Deccan
title: Jet Airways cuts fares by up to 30 per cent
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 06, 2015, 01.34 am Representational image Chennai : Ahead of the festive season, private carrier Jet Airways slashed its business and economy class fares up to 30 per cent on base fares across its global destinations including those in the US and Europe. Bookings for the six-day festive sales offer commenced from Monday and is available for all Jet Airways flights aligned with Etihad Airways and also on Jet Airways direct flights said a release. These special fares are on offer for travel on Jet Airways’ operated international flights to the Gulf, South Asia and South-east Asia region, the US and Europe and Canada regions, it added. “Jet Airways’ guests can now avail this very attractive global fares offer to plan their international travel,” said Jet Airways senior VP commercial Gaurang Shetty.
